short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Finds emoji in the document title and sets them as the favicon

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension looks for emoji in the title of the page / document and then copies it into the favicon used for that site. It works particularly well for Google Docs, or any app with many similar documents that are hard to differentiate.
